data.title: Alfonso XIII
data.text:
Born: 17-May-1886

Birthplace: Madrid, Spain

Died: 28-Feb-1941

Location of death: Rome, Italy

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, El Escorial, Madrid, Spain

Gender: Male

Religion: Roman Catholic

Race or Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Royalty

Nationality: Spain

Executive summary: King of Spain, 1902-31

Father: Alfonso XII (King of Spain)

Mother: Maria Christina of Austria

Wife: Victoria Eugenia of Battenberg (m. 31-May-1906)

Son: Alfonso Pío Cristino Eduardo, Prince of Asturias (b. 1907, d. 1938)

Son: Jaime Luitpold Isabelino Enrique (b. 1908, d. 1975)

Daughter: Beatriz Isabel Federica Alfonsa Eugenia (b. 1909, d. 2002)

Son: Fernando (stillborn, d. 1910)

Daughter: Maria Cristina Teresa Alejandra (b. 1911, d. 1996)

Son: Juan Carlos Teresa Silvestre Alfonso (b. 1913, d. 1993, father of Juan Carlos I)

Son: Gonzalo Manuel María Bernardo (b. 1914, d. 1934)

Mistress: Mélanie de Gaufridy de Dortan (one son)

Son: Roger Leveque de Vilmorin (b. 1905, d. 1980)

Mistress: Carmen Ruíz Moragas (actress, one son, one daughter)

Son: Leandro Alfonso Ruíz Moragas (b. 1929)

Daughter: Ana María Teresa Ruíz Moragas

Spanish Monarch 17-May-1886 to 14-Apr-1931 (regency by mother ended 1902)

Assassination Attempt 31-May-1906 (bombed by Mateu Morral)

Abdication 14-Apr-1931
